sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, CardTitle, Col, Container, CustomInput, DropdownItem, DropdownMenu, DropdownToggle, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Row, UncontrolledButtonDropdown } from "reactstrap"; const Default = () => ( Default @ @example.com https://example.com/users/ $ .00 $ 0.00 ); const CheckboxAndRadioAddons = () => ( Checkbox and radio addons ); const Sizing = () => ( Sizing @ @ @ ); const SelectAddons = () => ( Select addons ); const ButtonAddons = () => ( Button addons ); const ButtonsWithDropdowns = () => ( Buttons with dropdowns Action Action Another Action Something else here Seperated Link Action Action Another Action Something else here Seperated Link ); const SegmentedButtons = () => ( Segmented buttons Action Another Action Something else here Seperated Link Action Another Action Something else here Seperated Link ); const InputGroups = () => (

Input Groups

 ); export default InputGroups;
